name: Business As Usual [Demo]
description:
Carl The Cube Games Presents a short demo for the game Business As Usual!

Business As Usual tells the tale of a new employee in the afterlife, as they send messages to help people on earth that need a change in their lives. Strive to the best employee in your department, and have fun!

HOW TO PLAY: everything involves that handy mouse you probably have plugged into your computer right now, and it's left button! (Looks at tablet)...Okay, you can also use a *touch screen with your finger or stylus.* (Looks at flip phone)..um...play Business As Usual's demo today!

*NOTE: May not work properly on phones. The game is best played with a tablet or computer.*
